User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Important pages for indexing
Allow: /privacy
Allow: /terms
Allow: /submit-review

# Sitemap location (auto-generated with all protocol URLs)
Sitemap: https://defiscan.info/sitemap.xml

# Common crawl directives
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block any potential admin or internal paths
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/
